sentences.sContent: We successfully completed the certification for open water diving.
sentences.sCn: 我们成功地拿到了开放水域潜水证书。

sentences.sContent: ...I have a client that will bring up a new certification I've never even heard of and I'm in this industry...
...The lawsuits said that the label was misleading because it gave the impression that the products had been certified by a third party when the certification was the company's own...
...or any number of English certification exams...
...look at obtaining certification as a means to getting a better job and...

words.tran: 被证明的；有保证的；具有证明文件的
具有证明文件的；立有证据的；业经证明的
可证明的；可确认的；可保证的
证明，证实；颁发合格证书（certify的过去分词形式）
发给证明书；以证书形式授权给…；用证书批准

trans.tranOther: an official document that says that someone is allowed to do a certain job, that something is of good quality etc
